name: F Jones
text: We loved the quiet, cheerful atmosphere. Very roomy and uncrowded. The food was delicious! Salad, soup and pizza bar. A sweet young waitress did her best to please the 4 of us. Beautiful pictures (for sale) were on display around the perimeter of the restaurant.

name: Cheryl Horst
text: Buffet for $9.99.  Excellent pizza, kept replacing so it was always fresh. Many varieties too. Fresh salad bar, and fried food station....seasoned french fries and onion rings. Great soup. Great sweet desserts!

name: Churchtown Custom Cutters
text: New owners and they have a great buffet. We had lunch and it was $9.85 adult. Hot food buffet, salad/soup buffet, pizza, and afew baked goods and 2 desserts. Nice atmosphere and good food. They have a menu that offers appetizers, salads, sandwiches and a sundae bar that appeared to be an extra cost.

name: Erica Mcnier
text: First time here! Good food. Great customer service. Will definitely be back! Family friendly.

name: Joshua Fernando
text: Great place....it was my first time... I got a Stromboli and it was good... I highly recommend this place

name: David Lapp
text: Great place to take the family! Delicious food.

name: Jennifer Gill
text: The buffet was extremely old and stale. A 7 year old wouldn't eat their mozzarella sticks from the buffet because they were so stale, to put it in perspective. While the staff seem very polite and friendly, the food all seems like â€¦More

name: Ervin Miller
text: Great home cooking. Solid service. There's only so much you can do with buffet food. It's obviously not quite like having individually prepared plates, but as far as Buffet food, it's right up there.

name: Judy Reichart
text: Liked the pizza buffet. They are now closed

name: Cullen McGowan
text: Foxâ€™s Pizza has a store in Easton Pa about  10 years ago. That store had since disappeared and no other Foxâ€™s Pizza place is up there. I miss there pizza and subs. I ate there at least twice a week and the Big Daddy was awesome !! I give one star just because I miss the stores as there is not enough of them .

name: CHARLES BUNDY
text: The Biggest and best Cheesesteak  Around.  Packed full of meat  and the huge Sub roll was awesome...I'll definitely be back for more!!!!

name: MartÃ­n Torres
text: There were only my family and I on that day and time, the attention was great and the food was excellent, more than we were expecting.

name: Sheryl Burkholder
text: Will NEVER order from them again!!!!  First it took an hour and 40 minutes for our food to be delivered and it was way too cold- we live exactly 3.3 miles from Fox's which is only about 7 minutes- and the second time around the food was â€¦More

name: cody crandle
text: We got are pizza before bread sticks never go there angin

name: Pamela Saunders
text: Just opened. Food wasn't bad. Got to give them some time. Run by the Amish. I will definitely return.

name: Travis Zimmerman
text: Good food. Not a very professional environment.

name: Hoovy
text: Great pizza, and now they have more then just pizza, they also had a buffet of a small selection of home style cooking. Very good food!

name: Tina Mooney
text: Great local pizza shop.

name: Todbusa
text: Lov the lunch buffet... good pizza...

name: Carey Salisbury
text: Got the supreme stromboli and my husband got the custom, both were fantastic!  Great service too!

name: Roselle Weaver
text: Nice place! Not a big buffet, but tasty!!

name: Bob Ference
text: Ok more of a Dominoes/Pizza Hut/CiCi' s pizza buffet. Not hand tossed Neopalotin

name: Chester Lantz
text: Great place to eat... buffet

name: Tammie S.
text: Friendly staff!  New building which is welcoming.  Large selection.

name: Tom Hicks
text:
Best stromboli in the area.
Wedgies (sandwich on a pizza crust) are awesome

name: Amos Smucker
text: ,, good food good company good prices nice place to eat

exvellent food

text: Good place with both a menu and a buffet

name: Nathaniel Lantz
text: Awesome food and and a great place to eat!!

name: Julie Robinette
text: Delicious!  Meat supreme!!

name: Kerri Messner
text: Excellent stromboli

name: Reggie Stephens
text: The pizza just does not taste like the Fox's from western PA.

name: Diane Kinney
text: OK single slice pizza, but very spotty service

name: Nancy So Fancy
text: Like their dinner menu not so much their lunch menu.

name: Glen Groff
text: AWESOME
